title: Brainchop: Providing an Edge Ecosystem for Deployment of Neuroimaging Artificial Intelligence Models
details: SM Plis, M Masoud, F Hu, T Hanayik, SS Ghosh… - Aperture Neuro, 2024
abstract: Deep learning has proven highly effective in various medical imaging scenarios, yet the lack of an efficient distribution platform hinders developers from sharing models with end-users. Here, we describe brainchop, a fully functional web application that …
